content:
So... I've finished the tutorials, and started playing with a minor project or two. Any "beginners' projects" around/recommended? I'd like to start playing around with more applicable things as a way to get more used to how things are done!

(In case it shapes recommendations: I'm currently a programmer, previously a computability theorist with a reverse-math interest.)
... I did just find the Lean maths challenges. May try some of those, but still would be nice to have some later recommendations.
Assuming you've exhausted the material on our community learning page, you might browse some of the other Lean projects or even the parts of mathlib that you find interesting.
There are some mini projects in the mathlib archive that might be interesting too.
